definition: unable to help however much one would like to (idiom); Although we sympathize, there is no way to help you./My hands are tied.
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
do not/there is none who
surname Mo
can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy
surname Neng
to help/to assist

sentences.english: I regret that I can not help.
sentences.chinese: 很抱歉，此事我愛莫能助。

sentences.english: I'm sorry, but it's just not possible.
Sorry to be so disobliging, but I have no money to lend you.
sentences.chinese: 很抱歉，愛莫能助，我沒有錢借給你。

sentences.english: He knew they could not help him.
sentences.chinese: 他知道他們也愛莫能助。

sentences.english: Now, I can't do it for you. I'm too old.
sentences.chinese: 只是我現在愛莫能助，我年紀一大把了。

sentences.english: I appreciate your problem, but I don't think I can help.
sentences.chinese: 我理解你的困難，但卻愛莫能助。

sentences.english: He wrecks everything; there is not a thing. I can do about it.
sentences.chinese: 他把什麼事都弄糟了，我愛莫能助。

sentences.english: He's having a lot of problems, but my hands are tied.
sentences.chinese: 他有很多困難，但我愛莫能助。
對不起，我真是愛莫能助了。

sentences.english: Nothing can do, the only thing can blame on was did not exercise enough before hike the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 愛莫能助，怪也怪我不好好地做足運動。

definition: overwhelmed by favor from superior (humble expr.)
fellow sufferers empathize with each other (idiom); misery loves company
to have one's spirits dampened/to feel disappointed
hard to explain in a few words (idiom); complicated and not easy to express succinctly
to blame sb wrongly
to make an exhibition of oneself/to be a disgrace
layman
way/method/means/Taiwan pr. [fa1 r5]
ashamed and unable to show one's face
Heaven knows!
the will is there, but not the strength (idiom)/the spirit is willing but the flesh is weak
pinyin: xin1 you3 yu2 er2 li4 bu4 zu2

definition: to tell the truth/to tell it as it is
to deserve praise for one's courage (idiom)
see 直截了當|直截了当[zhi2 jie2 liao3 dang4]
to refund money
Chinese back-sloping comma 、 (punct. used to separate items in a list)
